entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
